detailsData.title: Client Care
detailsData.content: Client relationships last because clients come first. Emphasis on client needs and preferences.

detailsData.title: Value
detailsData.content: Rewarded on results and client service, not billable hours. Customized fee options.

detailsData.title: Passion
detailsData.content: Attorneys care more about the practice of law as a service than billable hours. Team collaboration.

address: 7755 Center Ave, Ste. 1100, Huntington Beach, CA 92647
subHeading: A Labor & Employment Law Firm for California's Employers
valueProp: Klatte, Budensiek & Young-Agriesti is a service-based labor and employment law firm specifically for California employers, prioritizing client care, resourcefulness, and a team of professionals who value the practice of law as a service.

testimonalData.text: KBY provided excellent legal representation for our company. Highly recommended.
